content: उद्धू {c5c} {c9c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To shake, move up, raise, throw up, wave (as a chawari); कैर्नोद्धूतानि चामराणि <ls>K. 117</ls>, <ls n="K.">200</ls>; <ls>Ku. 2. 29</ls>; उद्धुनीयात सत्केतून् <ls>Bk. 19 8</ls>; <ls>Ki. 5. 39.</ls> {@--2@} To shake or throw off; <ls>Śi. 18. 8</ls>, dispel, destroy (<ab>fig.</ab>), उद्धूतपापाः <ls>Me. 55.</ls> {@--3@} To disturb, excite, rouse up.
